ReceivedMessage: You're the new regional manager? You seem like someone who names your bears properly.

ToSend: He was my team leader in the 2nd Division. He was a very dedicated colleague.

ReceivedMessage: He kept on sending emails to HR about getting you promoted. Not beary nice.
ToSend: I apologise if it ended up inconveniencing you and the company.

ReceivedMessage: Eh| not my problem anyway. There was another one called Karen White?
ToSend: She was the manager of the 2nd Division. I remember her energy and focus towards her work.

ReceivedMessage: She sent death threats to tech support for an entire week before quitting. Beary scary.
ToSend: I'm very sorry on her behalf for causing trouble.

ReceivedMessage: Nah| everyone just ignored her. You know Rajesh Rao too?
ToSend: He was the manager in charge of the IT department. His works are quite innovative.

ReceivedMessage: He put a password on the vending machines and no one knows what it is. Pretty unbearable.
ToSend: I would like to ask for forgiveness on his behalf.

ReceivedMessage: Eh| about time we bought new ones anyway. By the way| which position did you take over?

ReceivedMessage: Oh| the manager that bearly anyone gets.
ToSend: With all due respect Sir| but how is this company running properly?

ReceivedMessage: Yeah. But I'm tired. My bears are tired too.
